How AI Rates Your Outfit

February 01, 2025

AI outfit rating is not about personal taste.

It evaluates measurable factors such as:

  • Color harmony
  • Silhouette balance
  • Occasion relevance
  • Trend alignment

Understanding these principles helps you dress smarter — not harder.
